review: My father lost all of his teeth and found it difficult to eat. So we decided to get his complete denture done. Dr Himaja is very patient and cleared all our doubts regarding the treatment. She suggested different treatment options and analysed the case carefully by clinical examination and xrays. It was done and he is very happy with the dentures. Highly recommended for people who are looking for professional and superior quality complete dentures

Excellent problem solver with superb care of Patients medical health.
Good explanation of the Dental issue and also quick resolution.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor patiently listens to the problem and properly analyse it and suggests best suitable treatment for the same.

****** **** ********** The staff and Dr's were very friendly. Dr. Himaja, who fixed the implant supported dentures for my father's missing teeth. It's a life - changing experience for us. She did an amazing job and my father felt very comfortable and no pain at all.

*** ****** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** *** I am always scared of going to the dentist and she takes such good care of me and my teeth. doctor treat us like their family members. Thank you for care and best treatment.
